      w   i   d   t   h   :       4   0   0   p   x   ;       h   e   i   g   h   t   :       3   9   p   x   ;       o   v   e   r   f   l   o   w   :       h   i   d   d   e   n   ;   "   &gt;   i   m   g       a   l   t   =   '   B   e   a   u   t   i   f   u   l       t   h   i   n   g   s   ,       u   p   d   a   t   e   d       d   a   i   l   y   '       s   r   c   =   '   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   g   -   e   c   x   .   i   m   a   g   e   s   -   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   G   /   0   1   /   x   -   l   o   c   a   l   e   /   c   o   m   m   o   n   /   t   r   a   n   s   p   a   r   e   n   t   -   p   i   x   e   l   .   _   V   3   8   6   9   4   2   4   6   4   _   .   g   i   f   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   4   0   0   p   x   '       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   '   3   9   p   x   '       u   s   e   m   a   p   =   '   #   n   a   v   -   s   w   m   -   h   o   l   i   d   a   y   -   m   a   p   '       /   &gt;   /   d   i   v   &gt;   d   i   v       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   d   i   s   p   l   a   y   :       n   o   n   e   ;   "   &gt;   m   a   p       i   d   =   "   n   a   v   -   s   w   m   -   h   o   l   i   d   a   y   -   m   a   p   "       n   a   m   e   =   "   n   a   v   -   s   w   m   -   h   o   l   i   d   a   y   -   m   a   p   "   &gt;    w   i   n   d   o   w   .   $   N   a   v       &amp;&amp;    $   N   a   v   .   d   e   c   l   a   r   e   (   '   c   o   n   f   i   g   .   p   i   n   n   e   d   N   a   v   M   i   n   W   i   d   t   h   '   ,   9   0   0   )   ;

                                                           v   a   r       i   n   d   e   x       =       j   Q   u   e   r   y   (   '   #   a   b   b   W   r   a   p   p   e   r       i   n   p   u   t   [   i   d   ^   =   m   b   b   -   o   f   f   e   r   i   n   g   I   D   -   ]   '   )   .   i   n   d   e   x   (   t   h   i   s   )   ;   
                                                           v   a   r       w   a   r   r   a   n   t   y   A   s   i   n       =       j   Q   u   e   r   y   (   t   h   i   s   )   .   p   a   r   e   n   t   s   (   '   .   a   b   b   L   i   s   t   I   t   e   m   '   )   .   f   i   n   d   (   '   i   n   p   u   t   [   n   a   m   e   ^   =   a   s   i   n   ]   '   )   .   v   a   l   (   )   ;   
                                                           l   o   g   C   h   e   c   k   B   o   x   R   e   f   T   a   g   (   f   l   a   g   ,       i   n   d   e   x   ,       w   a   r   r   a   n   t   y   A   s   i   n   )   ;   
                                                   }   )   ;   
                                                   j   Q   u   e   r   y   (   "   #   b   u   y   b   o   x       #   q   u   a   n   t   i   t   y   "   )   .   c   h   a   n   g   e   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   )       {   
                                                           v   a   r       q   u   a   n   t   i   t   y       =       j   Q   u   e   r   y   (   t   h   i   s   )   .   v   a   l   (   )   ;   
                                                           j   Q   u   e   r   y   (   "   #   a   b   b   W   r   a   p   p   e   r       .   a   b   b   L   i   s   t   I   t   e   m       i   n   p   u   t   [   n   a   m   e   ^   =   q   u   a   n   t   i   t   y   ]   "   )   .   e   a   c   h   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   )       {   
                                                                   t   h   i   s   .   v   a   l   u   e       =       q   u   a   n   t   i   t   y   ;   
                                                           }   )   ;   
                                                   }   )   ;   
   
                                                   l   o   g   R   e   f   T   a   g   (   "   p   s   d   _   b   b   _   i   _   B   0   0   N   4   1   5   E   7   Q   "   )   ;   
                                                   
                                                           
                                                           l   o   g   R   e   f   T   a   g   (   "   p   s   d   _   b   b   _   i   1   _   B   0   0   N   4   1   5   E   7   Q   _   B   0   0   8   3   J   7   E   U   O   "   )   ;   
   
                                                           $   (   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   )   .   d   e   l   e   g   a   t   e   (   '   #   m   b   b   A   d   d   C   o   v   e   r   a   g   e   1   '   ,       '   c   l   i   c   k   '   ,       f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   )       {   
                                                                   l   o   g   R   e   f   T   a   g   (   '   p   s   d   _   b   b   _   y   _   B   0   0   N   4   1   5   E   7   Q   _   B   0   0   8   3   J   7   E   U   O   '   )   ;

   i   n   p   u   t       i   d   =   "   s   h   o   w   -   i   m   m   e   r   s   i   v   e   -   v   i   e   w   -   o   n   -   s   o   f   t   l   i   n   e   s   "       t   y   p   e   =   "   h   i   d   d   e   n   "       v   a   l   u   e   =   "   f   a   l   s   e   "   /   &gt;   
   
   
   
                   
                   
                   
   
   
   
   
   
   	   
   
   
   
   
   
   !   -   -                       C   r   e   a   t   i   n   g       a       c   u   s   t   o   m       o   v   e   r   l   a   y       f   o   r       i   m   a   g   e       n   o   t       a   v   a   i   l   a   b   l   e       e   x   p   e   r   i   e   n   c   e       -   -   &gt;   
   d   i   v       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   v   a   r   i   a   t   i   o   n   U   n   a   v   a   i   l   a   b   l   e       u   n   a   v   a   i   l   a   b   l   e   E   x   p   "   &gt;   
                   d   i   v       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   i   n   n   e   r   "   &gt;

                                   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;

                                   $   (   "   #   q   u   a   n   t   i   t   y   "   )   .   l   i   v   e   (   "   c   h   a   n   g   e   "   ,       f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       (   e   v   e   n   t   )       {   
                                                   i   f       (   e   v   e   n   t   .   u   p   d   a   t   e   F   T   O   n   Q   u   a   n   t   i   t   y   C   h   a   n   g   e   )       {   
                                                                   r   e   t   u   r   n   ;   
                                                   }   
                                                   e   v   e   n   t   .   u   p   d   a   t   e   F   T   O   n   Q   u   a   n   t   i   t   y   C   h   a   n   g   e       =       1   ;   
   
                                                   v   a   r       q   u   a   n   t   i   t   y       =       $   (   t   h   i   s   )   .   v   a   l   (   )   ;
